ygData.subject: Re: Fishbone Earrings
ygData.msgSnippet: I saw these on the EQ lizer board, they sound awesome! Of course you could adventure with a druid and have him/her cast endure breath on you. It lasts a VERY
ygData.messageBody:
I saw these on the EQ'lizer board, they sound awesome! Of course you could
adventure with a druid and have him/her cast endure breath on you. It lasts
a VERY long time. Does require fish scales to cast. And you might want to
make sure he has Invigor memorized. You seem to loose STA at a steady pace
under water, and when you SIT under water it does not come back. And once it
is gone you can't move. By the way, do you need to have two of these
earrings on for them to work?

Chris aka Thunderheart
Level 19
Wood-Elf
Druid
Innoruuk server
---=== Divine Wind ===---



-----Original Message-----
From: kale usi [mailto:kaleusi@...]
Sent: Wednesday, May 26, 1999 11:34 AM
To: EverQuest@onelist.com
Subject: [EverQuest] Fishbone Earrings


From: "kale usi" <kaleusi@...>

I'm in desperate need of a set of the Fishbone Earrings so that I may
explore the bottom of Rathetear Lake, and was wondering if anyone would be
willing to help me out, by telling me where they can be found. Thanks in
advance for your help!
